channel.title: PvPscape 508!
channel.description:
In 2010 PvPscape was a popular 508, that had 80+ people on. It got shut down simply to hosting issues.
508's have been dieing out in the past couple years and we are trying to bring them back!
To download this server just go to [url=http://pvpscape.org]PvpScape | Home of the best RSPS[/url]
[B]The specs of PVP Scape are:[/B]
[B]PKing/PVP - There is PvP right outside of the GE. You can tele to easts to brid, go to the varrock west bank, and get full loots.[/B]
[IMG]http://s23.postimg.org/5enowurzf/pvpeverwhere.png[/img]
[B]Most Items Free Spawn, Rares Economy. To get rares you will need to boss and slay. To get free items just use the GE. [/B] [IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/ywstlqk2n/freeitemspvpscape.png[/img]
[B]Bossing - Get rares such as Chaotics, Fire Capes, Vestas/Statius, AGS, Bandos Armour[/B]
[IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/eap5azco5/bossingpvpscape.png[/img]
[B]Slayer for rares. Get Dark AGS, which has a 5% better spec than regular AGS. This gets people to kill npcs.[/B]
[IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/9brasi381/slayshop.png[/img]

item.title: PvPscape 508!
item.dc:creator: @fuzzball109 fuzzball109
item.description:
@fuzzball109 wrote:

In 2010 PvPscape was a popular 508, that had 80+ people on. It got shut down simply to hosting issues.

508â€™s have been dieing out in the past couple years and we are trying to bring them back!

To download this server just go to PvpScape | Home of the best RSPS

The specs of PVP Scape are:

PKing/PVP - There is PvP right outside of the GE. You can tele to easts to brid, go to the varrock west bank, and get full loots.

Most Items Free Spawn, Rares Economy. To get rares you will need to boss and slay.
To get free items just use the GE.

Bossing - Get rares such as Chaotics, Fire Capes, Vestas/Statius, AGS, Bandos Armour

Slayer for rares. Get Dark AGS, which has a 5% better spec than regular AGS. This gets people to kill npcs.
